channel.title: |Extrocity-Pk|Active/Instant Pking|Perfect Combat|Dedicated VPS|Bossing|Ect..|
channel.description:
[CENTER][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=5]Extrocity-Pk[/SIZE][/FONT] [SIZE=2]| Instant Pking | Active Pking | Great PVM Drops | Bossing | Perfected Combat | Custom Features | Dedicated VPS | [/SIZE] Website: [url=http://www.extrocity-pk.com]Extrocity[/url] Play Now: [url=http://www.extrocity-pk.com/play.php]Extrocity[/url] Wiki: [url=http://www.extrocity-pk.com/Wiki/wiki.html]Extrocity Wiki[/url] Download: [url=http://www.extrocity-pk.com/Client/Extrocity-Pk.jar]http://www.extrocity-pk.com/Client/Extrocity-Pk.jar[/url] Forums: Under Construction Voting: Under Construction Auto Donate: Under Construction
*The cache downloads pretty quick
[FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4][U]Content[/U][/SIZE][/FONT]
-Over a year of programming -Professional looking website -Forums -Auto Donation -Voting -Custom Wiki Page -Player Clipping -NPC Clipping -Two game modes: Instant Pking, or Trained Account -Loyalty Titles for game modes -All Dupes fixed -602 Skill Tab -Most Skills working -Lootshare(Almost done with coinshare) -Custom Pking tab -Targets, target points -Spawnables: Pk sets, food, pots, veng, barrage -All prices set -Full Godwars w/ all bosses working -KBD -Corporeal Beast -Kalphite Queen -Edgeville Pking based(Mage bank pking is an option for level differences) -Custom skilling area for skillers -Custom weapon upgrading system -Weapon Specials 100%:Korasi, Claws, Ags, Vls, Stat Hammer, V Spear, Handcannon) -Chaotics, Primals, D kite, Barrows whip, Lime whip, PvP Armours, Spirit Shieds, Vigour, Comp Cape, And way more -Ability to get void armors from getting melee kills, range kills, and mage kills -Stat resetting -Customized gameframe and client features -Donator - Spawn mantas, restore special, donator tele, ::yell, 10 Donator points -Super Donator - Spawn rocktails, restore special, Donator tele, ::yell, ::customtag(yell tag), 30 Donator Points -Elite Donator - Spawn rocktails, restore special, Donator tele, ::yell, ::customtag(yell tag), ::customlogin(custom login message)50 Donator Points -602 NPC's, 602 Animations, 474 Maps, 474 Obj, 317 base -Perfect Pking - uncheatable aswell -Perfect Duel Arena w/ no dupes -Dicing handled in clan chat -Dedicated Trentahost DDoS protected VPS. 99.9% Uptime -Turmoil in original prayer interface(hate when people add a new interface all the other prayers are awful) -Working Ring of Wealth -Switch magic books in the quest tab(information tab) -Perfect and clean looking shops -Perfect Item Switching -Fast Cache downloading -Wayyy more content, just login and see for yourself!
